~mllamazares

Hi, anonymous internet user! My name’s Miguel Llamazares. I’m a Cyber Security Analyst based in northern Spain with nearly ten years of experience in IT. I help mid to large-sized organisations formulate and implement a strategy for software security. When I’m not collaborating in GitHub, I’m researching Threat Modeling 1, sharing geeky stuff in my blog or messing around at TryHackMe 2. In the past, I worked with Secure Code Warrior 3, investigating and documenting a broad spectrum of bugs and vulnerabilities. I also have background in the airline industry, where I managed a technical team across all phases of the SDLC. Feel free to contact me via email or LinkedIn 4. Thanks for visiting my little island on the Internet!

  1. My work was promoted by Clint Gibler (semgrep creator), Adam Shostack (father of STRIDE) or Toreon. ↩

  2. At the time of writing, I rank in the top 1% of hackers there. ↩

  3. OWASP sponsor. ↩

  4. My mom says I’m very friendly! ↩
